Class tripleplay.ui.util.BoxPoint

Added Methods
BoxPoint align(HAlign, VAlign) Creates a new box point that is equivalent to this one except with the given horizontal and vertical alignment.
Point resolve(IDimension, Point) Finds the coordinates of the point, using the box with top left of 0, 0 and the given dimension.
